course_title: The Church's Mission in the World
class_notes: (Instructor: Abraham Lee (UM GBGM Missionary Practitioner in Residence)) (ON CAMPUS)
course_description: Explores the ways in which the church engages in mission throughout the world, with particular attention to the biblical, historical, theological, & practical dimensions of that engagement. In addition, the course will provide a framework to develop a missional perspective in order to lead the church in its mission in a global context. The course will concentrate on the development of cross-cultural missional practices in increasingly pluralistic contexts.
